typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> originaltxt
source(output(
		SK_SecurityID as integer,
		Symbol as string,
		Issue as string,
		Status as string,
		Name as string,
		ExchangeID as string,
		SK_CompanyID as integer,
		SharesOutstanding as integer,
		FirstTrade as date,
		FirstTradeOnExchange as date,
		Dividend as integer,
		IsCurrent as boolean,
		BatchID as decimal(5,0),
		EffectiveDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimSecurity
source(output(
		SK_DateID as integer,
		DateValue as date,
		DateDesc as string,
		CalendarYearID as decimal(4,0),
		CalendarYearDesc as string,
		CalendarQtrID as decimal(5,0),
		CalendarQtrDesc as string,
		CalendarMonthID as decimal(6,0),
		CalendarMonthDesc as string,
		CalendarWeekID as decimal(6,0),
		CalendarWeekDesc as string,
		DayOfWeeknumeric as decimal(1,0),
		DayOfWeekDesc as string,
		FiscalYearID as decimal(4,0),
		FiscalYearDesc as string,
		FiscalQtrID as decimal(5,0),
		FiscalQtrDesc as string,
		HolidayFlag as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> importDimDate
source(output(
		SK_CompanyID as integer,
		FI_YEAR as decimal(4,0),
		FI_QTR as decimal(1,0),
		FI_QTR_START_DATE as date,
		FI_REVENUE as decimal(15,2),
		FI_NET_EARN as decimal(15,2),
		FI_BASIC_EPS as decimal(10,2),
		FI_DILUT_EPS as decimal(10,2),
		FI_MARGIN as decimal(10,2),
		FI_INVENTORY as decimal(15,2),
		FI_ASSETS as decimal(15,2),
		FI_LIABILITY as decimal(15,2),
		FI_OUT_BASIC as decimal(12,0),
		FI_OUT_DILUT as decimal(12,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> impFinancial
originaltxt derive(DM_Date = toDate(split(Column_1,'|')[1],'yyyy-mm-dd'),
		DM_SYMB = split(Column_1,'|')[2],
		ClosePrice = split(Column_1,'|')[3],
		DayHigh = split(Column_1,'|')[4],
		DayLow = split(Column_1,'|')[5],
		{Volume } = split(Column_1,'|')[6]) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, DimSecurity join(DM_SYMB == Symbol,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
DerivedColumn7, importDimDate join(DM_Date == DateValue,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2
Join1 derive(Yied = divide(Dividend,toInteger(ClosePrice))*100) ~> DerivedColumn7
Join3 aggregate(groupBy(FI_YEAR,
		SK_SecurityID,
		DimSecurity@SK_CompanyID,
		SK_DateID),
	sumofearn = sum(FI_NET_EARN),
		volumn = sum(toInteger({Volume }))) ~> sumnetearn
Join2, impFinancial join(DimSecurity@SK_CompanyID == impFinancial@SK_CompanyID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join3
Join3 select(mapColumn(
		ClosePrice,
		DayHigh,
		DayLow,
		{Volume },
		SK_SecurityID,
		SK_CompanyID = DimSecurity@SK_CompanyID,
		BatchID,
		Yied,
		SK_DateID,
		FI_YEAR,
		FI_NET_EARN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
sumnetearn derive(PEratio = toFloat(ClosePrice)/(sumofearn/volumn)) ~> DerivedColumn8
DerivedColumn8 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
